properties.description: Practice sql script to pull data from Calendar.csv file.

content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE calendar_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.blob.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw'
)

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE calendar_data_raw

SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources

SELECT *
FROM 
OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR =',',
    ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
) 
WITH(
    date_key VARCHAR(10),
    [date] VARCHAR(15),
    [year] VARCHAR(15),
    [month] VARCHAR(15),
    [day] VARCHAR(15),
    day_name VARCHAR(15),
    day_of_year VARCHAR(15),
    week_of_month VARCHAR(15),
    week_of_year VARCHAR(15),
    month_name VARCHAR(15),
    year_month VARCHAR(15),
    year_week VARCHAR(15)
)
AS [result]
